channel.title: Rspec on Michael Bumann
channel.description: Recent content in Rspec on Michael Bumann

item.title: rspec is lovely
item.description: A few days ago I’ve visited my friend and fellow railslover @reddavis in bath and I was lucky to get a great rspec2 tutorial at the bathcamp (the bath unconference). rspec really has some great features that make writing and maintaining specs a lot more easy and fun. Red has posted some examples on the railslove blog. So make sure to test rspec2 and read red’s post
